item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Irony doesn't crash anymore if it encounters an invalid image extension (courtesy of modders who cannot use proper extensions) CHANGES FROM v1.6: * Add chinese translation (thanks to Windmill-City) * Switch to custom noto font * UI readjusted due to new font * Add mod collection file hash verification (intended use case is for MP gameplay) * Add option to not close Irony after launching game (per game setting)
